field.label: DNS Provider
field.help: Select the DNS provider for the DNS-01 Challenge and Dynamic DNS. This is optional, since certificates will be requested from Let's Encrypt via HTTP Challenge when this option is unset. You mostly need this for Wildcard Certificates, and for Dynamic DNS. To use the DNS-01 Challenge and Dynamic DNS, enable the checkbox in a Reverse Proxy Domain or Subdomain.

field.label: DNS API Key
field.help: This is the standard field for the API Key. If your DNS Provider has only 1 API Key, enter it here and leave all other fields empty. Some DNS Providers need special configuration here: Route53 "access_key_id", Porkbun "api_key", ACME-DNS "username", Google Cloud DNS "gcp_project", Azure "tenant_id", OpenStack Designate "region_name", Google Domains "access_token", OVH "endpoint", Namecheap "api_key", PowerDNS "server_url", DDNS "api_token", Metaname "api_key", Linode "api_token", Tencent Cloud "secret_id", Dinahosting "username", Hexonet "username", Mail-in-a-Box "api_url".

field.label: DNS Secret API Key
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Route53 "secret_access_key", Porkbun "api_secret_key", ACME-DNS "password".

field.label: DNS API Optional Field 1
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: ACME-DNS "subdomain".
